00044   inline Eval_Source_C_VEF_Face();
00045   void completer();
00046   void associer_champs(const Champ_Don& );
00047   void mettre_a_jour( );
00048   inline double calculer_terme_source_standard(int ) const ;
00049   inline double calculer_terme_source_non_standard(int ) const ;

00064 // Fonctions inline de la classe Eval_Puiss_Th_Uniforme_VEF_Face

00066 
00067 inline Eval_Source_C_VEF_Face::Eval_Source_C_VEF_Face() {}
00068 
00069 inline double Eval_Source_C_VEF_Face::calculer_terme_source_standard(int num_face) const
00070 {
00071   double source;
00072   if (sub_type(Champ_Uniforme,la_source_constituant.valeur().valeur()))
00073     source = source_constituant(0,0)*volumes_entrelaces(num_face);
00074   else
00075     source = (source_constituant(face_voisins(num_face,0),0)*volumes(face_voisins(num_face,0)) + source_constituant(face_voisins(num_face,1),0)*volumes(face_voisins(num_face,1)))/nb_faces_elem;
00076 
00077   return (source*porosite_surf(num_face));
00078 }
00079 
00080 inline double Eval_Source_C_VEF_Face::calculer_terme_source_non_standard(int num_face) const
00081 {
00082   double source;
00083   if (sub_type(Champ_Uniforme,la_source_constituant.valeur().valeur()))
00084     source = source_constituant(0,0)*volumes_entrelaces_Cl(num_face);
00085   else
00086     {
00087       if (face_voisins(num_face,1) != -1)
00088         source = (source_constituant(face_voisins(num_face,0),0)*volumes(face_voisins(num_face,0)) + source_constituant(face_voisins(num_face,1),0)*volumes(face_voisins(num_face,1)))/nb_faces_elem;
00089       else
00090         source = source_constituant(face_voisins(num_face,0),0)*volumes(face_voisins(num_face,0))/nb_faces_elem;
00091     }
00092 
00093   return (source*porosite_surf(num_face));
00094 }
00095 
00096 inline void Eval_Source_C_VEF_Face::calculer_terme_source_standard(int num_face, DoubleVect& source) const
00097 {
00098   if (sub_type(Champ_Uniforme,la_source_constituant.valeur().valeur()))
00099     {
00100       source.inject_array(source_constituant);
00101       source *= volumes_entrelaces(num_face)*porosite_surf(num_face);
00102     }
00103   else
00104     {
00105       int size=source.size();
00106       for (int i=0; i<size; i++)
00107         source(i) = (source_constituant(face_voisins(num_face,0),i)*volumes(face_voisins(num_face,0))+source_constituant(face_voisins(num_face,1),i)*volumes(face_voisins(num_face,1)))/nb_faces_elem
00108                     *porosite_surf(num_face);
00109     }
00110 }
00111 
00112 inline void Eval_Source_C_VEF_Face::calculer_terme_source_non_standard(int num_face, DoubleVect& source) const
00113 {
00114   if (sub_type(Champ_Uniforme,la_source_constituant.valeur().valeur()))
00115     {
00116       source.inject_array(source_constituant);
00117       source *= volumes_entrelaces_Cl(num_face)*porosite_surf(num_face);
00118     }
00119   else
00120     {
00121       int size=source.size();
00122       for (int i=0; i<size; i++)
00123         if (face_voisins(num_face,1) != -1)
00124           source(i) = (source_constituant(face_voisins(num_face,0),i)*volumes(face_voisins(num_face,0))+source_constituant(face_voisins(num_face,1),i)*volumes(face_voisins(num_face,1)))/nb_faces_elem
00125                       *porosite_surf(num_face);
00126         else
00127           source(i) = source_constituant(face_voisins(num_face,0),i)*volumes(face_voisins(num_face,0))*porosite_surf(num_face)/nb_faces_elem;
00128     }
00129 }
